text: His madness was that he was the airline tourist who had made the most round-trip trips, visiting every airport in the world. -I'm leaving for Syracuse, next week I'll be in Timor and in fifteen days I'll be back by way of New York... in those turns and contrashores through the seven skies of the world, one day as he descended on the landing field in Lisbon he found that he was waiting for him himself; or he had advanced or was already about to get back on the same plane. FIN
title: Récord de viajero de avión
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
